Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Establishes the sporting range good neighbor act
Summary: Establishes the sporting range good neighbor act requiring skeet field tracts at shooting ranges to be certain dimensions; prohibits them from including wetlands or open water sources; directs the department of environmental conservation to promulgate rules and regulations regarding environmental stewardship and lead ammo material reclamation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing the "sporting range good neighbor act"
